LanguageData.XMonsters_TerriblyLowMeleeCrit.label: terribly low critical hit chance
LanguageData.XMonsters_TerriblyLowMeleeCrit.descripti:
Carriers of the gene never or rarely deal critical hits. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryLowMeleeCrit.label: very low critical hit chance
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryLowMeleeCrit.description:
Carriers of the gene have a very low chance of deal critical hit. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_LowMeleeCrit.label: low critical hit chance
LanguageData.XMonsters_LowMeleeCrit.description:
Carriers of the gene have a low chance of deal critical hit. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.

LanguageData.XMonsters_HighMeleeCrit.description:
Carriers of the gene have a high chance of deal critical hit. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryHighMeleeCrit.label: very high critical hit chance
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryHighMeleeCrit.description:
Carriers of the gene have a very high chance of deal critical hit. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_DevastatinglyHighMeleeCrit.des:
This is a case where should avoid melee combat unnecessarily. 
But who should? 
That's a whole other question. 

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color> 

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
